## InstalledAppInfoStatus type


**Signature:**

```typescript
export type InstalledAppInfoStatus = {
    type: "paused";
    value: {
        reason: PausedAppReason;
    };
} | {
    type: "disabled";
    value: {
        reason: DisabledAppReason;
    };
} | {
    type: "awaiting_memproofs";
} | {
    type: "running";
};
```
